config_description: Throttles all streaming file transfer between the datacenters, this setting allows users to throttle inter dc stream throughput in addition to throttling all network stream traffic as configured with
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'stream_throughput_outbound_megabits_per_sec' is used to throttle all streaming file transfer between the datacenters. It allows users to limit the inter dc stream throughput and network stream traffic.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the 'setStreamThroughputMbPerSec' method is called to set a new value for the stream throughput. It is also triggered when calculating the rate in bytes using the 'calculateRateInBytes' method.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option is significant as it directly affects the throughput of streaming file transfers between datacenters. Setting a lower value can limit the throughput, while setting it to 0 or a negative value disables throttling.
